fields.name: description
fields.description: The field for the description record component.

fields.name: packFormat
fields.description: The field for the packFormat record component.

fields.name: supportedFormats
fields.description: The field for the supportedFormats record component.

constructors.name: PackMetadataSection
constructors.description: Creates an instance of a PackMetadataSection record class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object. The value is derived from the hash code of each of the record components.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. Reference components are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object) ; primitive components are compared with '=='.

methods.name: description
methods.description: Returns the value of the description record component.

methods.name: packFormat
methods.description: Returns the value of the packFormat record component.

methods.name: supportedFormats
methods.description: Returns the value of the supportedFormats record component.
